About TextLog - Minimalist, distraction-free and content-focused Jekyll theme

Jan 15, 2017 • Heiswayi Nrird • #Demo #About

TextLog is a minimalist, distraction-free and content-focused Jekyll theme. TextLog uses Droid Sans typeface from Google Web Fonts. TextLog also supports Disqus comment and tags

TextLog post layout contains following structures:

  • the post title
  • the post metadata such as date, author name and clickable post tags
  • the post content
  • Disqus comment if enabled

TextLog is responsive and mobile-friendly.
